title: Skin Idea (Give Feedback)
body:
So first time ever doing this but Riot please Pyramid head from Silent Hill it is beyond perfect for Tryndamere, it incorporates his body style, walk style, and weapon of choice.  I think it would be an awesome addition to the game, I mean any horror movie fan would love it... just take a look

( I do not take ownership of the picture and/or creation of the artwork.. I am not talented enough for that)

replies.body:
So... What you want is Nightmare Tryndamere, which we already have.
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Tryndamere_7.jpg

TBH heaps shit & negative 
Bring the light back into the game, because your making the game shit and negative for the youth that are playing this game
I think you're reading a negative tone into something which was pretty harmless. Chill out bro. :)

The only reason LoL cannot use the trademark Pyramid head is because of copyright. Konami will butcher Riot with lawsuits and they will lose /period/. At least we have a skin that's somewhat familiar, similar tones and experience - Nightmare Tryndamere.
